text: Friedel Rausch (27 February 1940 â€“ 18 November 2017) was a German football player and manager. In April 2006, Rausch was diagnosed with skin cancer. He died of the disease on 18 November 2017 at the age of 77. ==References== ==Other websites== *Friedel Rausch at eintracht-archiv.de *Friedel Rausch at mackolik.com Category:1940 births Category:2017 deaths Category:German football managers Category:German footballers Category:Deaths from skin cancer Category:FC Schalke 04 managers Category:FC Basel managers
